actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 95-1596.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill H.R. 12299 to establish a Federal Office on Domestic Violence, and a Federal Counsel on Domestic Violence, to provide grants for the assistance of victims of domestic violence and for training programs, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 12299 (Federal Office on Domestic Violence).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill H.R. 12299 to establish a Federal Office on Domestic Violence, and a Federal Counsel on Domestic Violence, to provide grants for the assistance of victims of domestic violence and for training programs, and for other purposes.
